caption.title: Disturbance and avoidance of specific consequences of climate change in patients and tourists.
caption.p: Left: Degree of disturbance. Rating: 1- not disturbing, 2- rather disturbing, 3- disturbing, 4 absolutely disturbing. Right: Avoidance. Rating: 1- not avoid, 2- avoid. The item extreme weather events include thunderstorms, gale storms and heavy rain, but not heat days. * p<0.05, ** p<0.01, *** p<0.001 significant differences between patients and tourists by Kruskal-Wallis-Test.
